s0: ^I couldn't decide between eating the apple or cherry pie. I ate both. My tummy hurts.
s1: ^Beware of the forest at night... naw, just kidding!
s2: ^Can you believe I once tried to fish with a carrot? Spoiler: it didn't work.
s3: ^If you find any enchanted socks, they're mine. Long story.
s4: ^I invented a new dance move called 'The Epic Fail'; want to learn?
s5: ^I lost my sandwich in the pond; now the ducks are my enemies
s6: ^I swear the moon winked at me last night; or maybe I was just sleepy.
s7: ^The tavern is a good place to get quests. Wait, wrong game.
s8: ^I put my shoes on the wrong feet today. Again!
s9: ^Ever see a squirrel do a backflip? Me neither, but I dream big!
